Question: 4BY4 INC. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
4BY4 INC.

Pixell AI

- AI trained on super-high-definition videos
- Fine-tunes attributes like saturation, sharpness, contrast, and noise
- Achieves remarkable improvement in video quality
- About 50% reduction in video bitrate
- Recognized in CES 2024 Innovation Awards in 'Content & Entertainment' and 'Digital Imaging/Photography' categories
- Versatile, producible as software or AI semiconductor package
- Set to accelerate global market expansion
- Participating in CES 2024 to showcase immersive content creation technology, premium video and image stock platform, and video quality advancement AI technology and products
Summary_cn:
4BY4 INC.

Pixell AI

- 通过对超高清视频进行训练的人工智能
- 优化饱和度、锐度、对比度和噪音等属性
- 在视频质量方面取得显著改进
- 视频比特率减少约50%
- 在CES 2024创新奖的“内容与娱乐”和“数字成像/摄影”类别中获得认可
- 具备多功能性，可生产为软件或人工智能半导体包装
- 拟加速全球市场扩张
- 参加CES 2024展会，展示沉浸式内容创作技术、优质视频和图像库平台，以及视频质量改进的人工智能技术和产品
